sections.text:
81-918.Department of Correctional Services; adopt rules and regulations.

The Department of Correctional Services shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations necessary to carry out sections 81-907 and 81-909 to 81-918.

SourceLaws 1977, LB 548, ยง 12;Laws 1981, LB 536, ยง 6;Laws 1982, LB 767, ยง 6.
